TERMS & CONDITIONS

Please read these Terms & Conditions before proceeding as they set out the legal framework for the information provided in this website. By accessing this website (“the Website”) you are deemed to have read and accepted these Terms & Conditions.

Agile Advantage Consulting DMCC maintains this website and the content within. The distribution of the information contained in the Website may be restricted by law in certain countries and persons who access it are required to inform themselves of, and to comply with, any such restrictions. The information is not intended to be published or made available to any person in any jurisdiction where doing so would contravene any applicable laws or regulations. By accessing this Website you confirm that you are aware of the laws in your own jurisdiction relating to services and you undertake not to pass on or utilise the information contained in the Website in a manner that could constitute a breach of such laws by Agile Advantage Consulting DMCC, its associates, subsidiaries, branches or their respective directors, employees, representatives or agents.

The Website does not constitute an offer or solicitation. The Website is provided for information purposes only and does not constitute investment, legal, tax or other advice or any recommendation to invest, buy, or sell or otherwise transact any of the services mentioned. Prospective investors should take independent professional advice before making any investment decision.

The pictures and content provided in the Website may resemble similar third party firms, companies and its content. Such content is provided for the purpose of illustration only. Agile Advantage Consulting DMCC, its associates, subsidiaries, branches or their respective directors, employees, representatives or agents do not assume any responsibility nor accept any claim or liability for the same.

Agile Advantage Consulting DMCC retains all intellectual property rights related to the contents of the Website. Information on the Website may not be published or redistributed without Agile Advantage Consulting’s prior written consent. Agile Advantage Consulting accepts no responsibility for the content of any external websites linked to the Website nor any products or services offered through such external websites. The use of such external websites is at the user’s own risk. Limitations to our Liability Under any circumstances, our liability is restricted to the extent of professional services offered and charged to clients, its associates and third parties as per acceptance of engagement contract. Under no circumstances, Agile Advantage Consulting DMCC or any third party content providers, successors, parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, directors, shareholders, investors, employees, agents, attorneys and their heirs assigned be liable for any damages including direct, incidental, punitive, special, consequential or exemplary damages that directly or indirectly result from the use of, or the inability to use, this Website or the information contained on the site or obtained from your use of this Website. Applicable Laws This agreement is governed and interpreted pursuant to the laws of the United Arab Emirates, notwithstanding any principles of conflicts of law and expressly agree that exclusive jurisdiction resides in the courts of United Arab Emirates. Privacy Policy Agile Advantage Consulting DMCC only collects Personal Information to the extent deemed necessary to serve its legitimate business purposes, and it uses appropriate security technology to ensure the security, integrity, and privacy of all Personal Information as it deems appropriate. Nonetheless, Agile Advantage Consulting is not responsible for any breach of its security or for the actions of any third parties who may obtain any Personal Information. If you fill in a form on our website we will store the information provided by you. This information may be used for very occasional contact by us in the future relating to other relevant information that may be of interest to you. Removal or Update of Personal Information You can update, opt-out, unsubscribe or remove your personal information at any time by replying to a marketing email with ‘Unsubscribe’ or by emailing info@agileadvantage.ae with the requested action. We will promptly correct any information found to be incorrect. Change to Policy Agile Advantage Consulting DMCC reserves the right to change this Policy at any time by posting an updated Policy at the Websites.
